item.title: Temp titlen temp title temp title temp title temp title temp title temp title
item.description: Sherlock Holmes class Solution { public int minDeletions(String s) { int[] count = new int[26]; for(char c : s.toCharArray()){ count[c - 'a']++; } PriorityQueue<Integer> pq = new PriorityQueue<>(Collections.reverseOrder()); for(int i: count){ if(i != 0) pq.add(i); } int last = -1; int ans = 0; while(!pq.isEmpty()){ if(last == -1){ last = pq.poll(); continue; } int current = pq.poll(); if(current == 0) continue; if(last == current){ pq.add(current - 1); ans++; }else{ last = current; } } return ans; } } XXXX
